attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people I know don't want to work because they get their rents and council tax paid by the present system whilst getting JSA.  JSA should only be paid to those who can show a CV with recent work history.  I have just been made redundant and as somebody with a mortgage on a leasehold flat I don't even get help with my service charges - yet if I was renting the same flat then my rent would be paid by Housing benefits.  The system penalises those of us who work yet pays loads in benefits to alcholics, single mums and the work shy.

rejection.details: There are already several petitions live on the topic of JSA. Please see http://search.petitions.number10.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?ha=1157&sc=number10&qt=job+seeker
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
